column3: What would happen if we ran `FindVariableFeatures` after `ScaleData`?
column4: Nothing, the resulting list of genes would be the same
column5: The resulting list of genes may have differences

column3: What would happen if we skip `ScaleData`? Would PCA be affected?
column4: Nothing, PCA is a robust procedure
column5: The resulting PCA has biases introduced by the absolute values of our count matrix

column3: What would happen if we skip `NormalizeData`? Would UMAP be affected?
column4: Nothing, UMAP is a stochastic procedure so all the randomness corrects itself
column5: UMAP runs, the looks are far from perfect, but the downstream DE testing won’t be affected so my conclusions are safe
column6: The resulting PCs would be biased, UMAP runs, but the result is biased too.
column7: The resulting PCs would be biased, so UMAP is bound to run into errors

column3: Would it be any difference if we ran `FindNeighbors` and `FindClusters` but only after UMAP?
column4: Nothing, clustering is a complementary but parallel process to UMAP
column7: Depends! If we wanted to FindNeighbors using reduction=’umap’

column3: Given that genes used for clustering are the same genes tested for differential expression, Would you interpret the (adjusted) p-values without concerns?
column4: No concerns, the workflow is trusted by tons of citations.

column3: Which marker gene is the most expressed in cluster 1 when comparing it to cluster 2?
What would happen if we used `ident.1 = 2`, and `ident.2 = 1` instead?
column4: There’s no symmetry, nor proportional law in the results.
column5: Both Avg. Log2 FC and P-values would be different.
column6: Average log2 Fold Change sign would swap (FC * -1)
column7: Average log2 Fold Change would be inverted (1 / FC)

column3: How would you extract the 'gene signature' of a given cluster? By DE testing with…
column4: ROC analysis, against all remaining clusters
column5: Logistic regression, against all remaining clusters
column6: Any test, against the most distant cell type as the cleanest baseline
column7: Any test, against the remaining clusters
